name: Ponomarev Denis
title: Front-End Web Developer
prompt: I am a front-end developer with more then 5 years of experience in web development. During last years I developed a number of web sites and applications using latest web standarts. This is what I do and what am I like to do.
blockquote:
when others failed,
we take the stage!

goal: I am an IT professinal. This year i decided to work in Amsterdam.

I already have  AIESEC and  European Voluntary Service expirirence. I orginized events, festival and cordinate the training course. Found jobs for incoming volunteers, Invited about 40 people total volunteers and coordinators. Helped others to find their interships abroad.
Have been host family for intern from Brasil:)
New knowledge, Socialization in new environment and Developing my leadership skills are my goals.
My final long-term goal is to be able to become a team leader in international IT company.
--description: No bad habits. Fast learning, Hardworking and Responsible. Able to work without assistance and as team member.

In free time perform with fire-show and trickers groups. Taking active part in university live . Taking part in VIII international festival of chorus art “singing world” in Saint Petersburg with students’ choir.
I like sports, such as cycling, swimming, track and field. Take first place in the university athletic competitions for freshmen in university

strong_description: My strongest skills are HTML5, CSS3 and javascript. I prefer to use AngularJS, LESS and MongoDB/NodeJS or frameworks like Angular-Meteor in my applications.
I worked a lot with enchanced HTML5 graphics (presentations, schemes, charts etc). I used RaphaelJS for SVG; EaselJS, KineticJS, FabricJS for CANVAS; ThreeJS for WebGL.

I developed cross-browser cross-platform web applications, with modern features and and polyfills for old and mobile browsers (Android, iOS, IE8). Expirienced with creating mobile apps packaged through PhoneGap.
weak_description: Before i set priority on Web FrontEnd i mostly worked on Qt. Created Linux/Windows/Android applications.

travel.value: Travelling is my passion, opporunity to travel is always a good point for me

volunteer.value: I`ve been a participant in different youth international exchange programs, organized events with foreign volunteers.

bicycle.value: I like active sports, Cycling, Snowboarding.

fire.value: I perform with fire-show with trickers and stuntmen.

awards: Built an ecommerce webapp to sell products online. Increased company sales by 58%.
Designed a customer web form for a local dentist's office. Increased patient satisfaction scores by 30%.
Developed a launch website for the Indie Documentary Jogging the Amazon. Boosted streaming sales by 60%.
Created a website and Facebook-linked donations webapp for a local animal shelter. Raised donations by 38%. Saved the lives of 15 dogs.
